Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: ウォンティガ
Entry.EnglishText: Wontiga

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: ウォンティガの聖殿
Entry.EnglishText: Shrine of Wontiga

Entry.JapaneseText: ウォンティガの聖殿・十階
Entry.EnglishText: Shrine of Wontiga - 10F

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>よ、よくぞここまで来た。 私はウォンティガ、風の聖獣だ。
Entry.EnglishText: You have done well to reach me, <Annie>. I am Wontiga, the Sacred Beast of Wind.

Entry.JapaneseText: 風の聖獣……ウォンティガ……
Entry.EnglishText: The Sacred Beast of Wind, Wontiga...

Entry.JapaneseText: ここに至るまでに、私が君に 見せたものは、すべて事実だ。 しかし、君の決意に揺らぎは 感じられない……なぜか？
Entry.EnglishText: All of these visions that I have shown to you are the reality of what has happened. However, I sense that your resolve has not wavered. Why do you think that is?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……「命に色はない」と言った、 お父さんの思いが、やっと わかったような気がするからです。
Entry.EnglishText: Because "life knows no color." That was what my father believed, and I think I've finally come to understand the meaning behind it.

Entry.JapaneseText: 父の思いか…… 君の信じる父親が何をしたのか、 それを知っても、君は同じ事を 言えるのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Your father's beliefs... I wonder if you will be able to say such a thing after you have learned what the father you trusted in had committed.

Entry.JapaneseText: どういう意味……？
Entry.EnglishText: What are you talking about...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 君に見せよう。 君の父親の事件のすべてを。 これが最後の試練だ。
Entry.EnglishText: Behold... The events leading up to your father's death in their entirety. This shall be your final test.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……これが……事実……
Entry.EnglishText: So that is what really happened...

Entry.JapaneseText: これを見ても君は、 父を信じる事ができるのか。 命に色はないと言えるのか。
Entry.EnglishText: Even after witnessing such events, do you still believe in your father? Can you still claim that "life knows no color?"

Entry.JapaneseText: ……わたしの答は変わりません……
Entry.EnglishText: ...My answer has not changed.

Entry.JapaneseText: 「命に色はない」と言ったのは お父さんです……
Entry.EnglishText: My father was the one who said that "life knows no color..."

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、その言葉の意味に 気づかせてくれたのは <Eugene>でした……
Entry.EnglishText: ...But the one who made me realize the meaning behind those words was <Eugene>.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……お父さんの事件以来、 わたしの心は憎しみで いっぱいでした……
Entry.EnglishText: Ever since my father passed away, my heart has been consumed by hatred.

Entry.JapaneseText: あの人を憎み、 ガジュマを憎むあまりに、 わたしは無関係の人を傷つけたり、 苦しめたりしてきました。
Entry.EnglishText: I hated <Eugene>, and even the entire Gajuma race, to the point where I brought pain and suffering to those who had done nothing to me.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、<Eugene>は、何度も何度も 手を差し伸べてくれたんです。 こんなわたしに……
Entry.EnglishText: But in spite of that, <Eugene> was always there to lend a hand, even to someone like myself...

Entry.JapaneseText: お父さんの命を奪ったのは 彼かもしれない。 その事は、とてもつらいです…… でも……
Entry.EnglishText: He may have been the one who took my father's life. ...and that hurts, more than anything, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: わたしが彼のガジュマの身体の 奥に見た彼の心、彼の命は、 わたしと同じだった。
Entry.EnglishText: When I was truly able to look past his Gajuma appearance and into his heart, I saw that it was just the same as my own.

Entry.JapaneseText: 目に見えるものだけが <Cyan>真実<White>じゃないって、 やっと思えるように なったんです。
Entry.EnglishText: I can finally say that the <Cyan>truth<White> is more than just what you can see with your own eyes.

Entry.JapaneseText: 命に色はない、という言葉は、 わたしの見つけた<Cyan>真実<White>だから……
Entry.EnglishText: The <Cyan>truth<White> that I have discovered for myself is that life knows no color!

Entry.JapaneseText: だから、きっとヒューマと ガジュマはわかり合える。 わたしはそう信じます。
Entry.EnglishText: So I am certain that someday, Huma and Gajuma will come to understand one another. That is what I believe.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……わたしに力を貸してください。 ヒューマとガジュマが、 共に歩む世界を取り戻すために……
Entry.EnglishText: Please, lend me your strength. Help me to restore the world so that Huma and Gajuma may walk side by side once more.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……よかろう。 <Annie>、君に私の力を与える。 フォルスを……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Very well. I shall bestow my power unto you, <Annie>. Manifest your Force...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……これが、聖獣の力？
Entry.EnglishText: This is the power of a Sacred Beast...?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>、その力とともに、 <Yellow>ヒト<White>の心に君の<Cyan>真実<White>を 風と吹かせる事を願う。
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>, I pray that you use your power to have the wind carry your truth into the hearts of <Yellow>Man<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: ただし、君の心に少しでも迷いが 生じれば、その力は君の身体を 微塵に切り裂くだろう。 その事を忘れないでほしい。
Entry.EnglishText: However, if your heart falters even slightly, this power shall rend your body asunder. I would like for you to remember that.

Entry.JapaneseText: はい!!
Entry.EnglishText: I will!

Entry.JapaneseText: やったネ、<Annie>!!
Entry.EnglishText: You did it, <Annie>!

Entry.JapaneseText: うん!!
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……大変、大変だ!!
Entry.EnglishText: ...There's trouble! Big trouble!

Entry.JapaneseText: どうした、<Mao>!?
Entry.EnglishText: What is it, <Mao>?!

Entry.JapaneseText: ぼくは……<Cyan>聖獣シャオルーン<White>。
Entry.EnglishText: I am the Sacred Beast Shaorune.

Entry.JapaneseText: シャオルーン!?
Entry.EnglishText: Shaorune?

Entry.JapaneseText: くわしい話は後！ 今すぐ<Cyan>ベルサス<White>に向かうんだ!! <Veigue>、急がないと、キミは <Yellow>大切なものを失う<White>事になる！
Entry.EnglishText: Details later! You guys need to <Cyan>hurry to Belsas<White> right away. <Veigue>, if you don't hurry, <Yellow>you're going to lose something precious to you!<White>

Entry.JapaneseText: 大切なもの？ オレの……？
Entry.EnglishText: Something precious to me...?

Entry.JapaneseText: オレの大切なものって……
Entry.EnglishText: What would be precious to me...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 今のは、どういう事なんですか？
Entry.EnglishText: What was that just now?

Entry.JapaneseText: シャオルーンが直接出て来た以上、 私が関われるのはここまでだ。 <Annie>、君の幸運を祈る。
Entry.EnglishText: Since Shaorune has contacted you directly, my role ends here. <Annie>, I shall be praying for your safety.

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖獣は急げと言っていた。 ベルサスに急行するぞ。出発だ。
Entry.EnglishText: The Sacred Beast said to hurry. We need to head to Belsas. Let's leave.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: ……前に来た時には、 こんなものはなかった……
Entry.EnglishText: There wasn't anything the last time we were here...
Entry.Notes: I believe dialogue changes on character - this one's Veigue needs linebreaking duping correction

Entry.JapaneseText: ラッキー!! 前に来た時には 何もなかったのに！
Entry.EnglishText: It's my lucky day! There wasn't anything the last time we were here!

Entry.JapaneseText: うむ……以前、ここには 何もなかったと思うが……
Entry.EnglishText: Hm... I don't think there was anything the last time we were here...

Entry.JapaneseText: まさか、こんなところに…… とても意外な感じね。
Entry.EnglishText: I never expected to find something here, of all places...

Entry.JapaneseText: おう、こんなとこに発見が！ おどろき桃の木だぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: Well, would you look at that! To think I'd discover something here!

Entry.JapaneseText: こんなところに…… そう、こんな事もあるのね。
Entry.EnglishText: How'd this get here...? Well, I guess things like that just happen.

Entry.JapaneseText: 初めてのアイテム会話
Entry.EnglishText: First Time Item Conversation

Entry.JapaneseText: 一度行った場所でも、 何か見つかる場合が あるという事か……
Entry.EnglishText: I guess this means you can still find things in places you've already been...

Entry.JapaneseText: 一度行ったところでも、 調べに行ったら、 新しい発見があるかもネ！
Entry.EnglishText: We might be able to discover things in other places that we've already been to!

Entry.JapaneseText: 一度行った場所でも、 新しい発見があるかもしれんな。
Entry.EnglishText: I suppose we might find things in places that we've already visited.

Entry.JapaneseText: 一度行った場所でも、こうやって 調べたら何かみつかるかも……？
Entry.EnglishText: Perhaps we can find new things if we explore places we've already been...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 前に行った場所でも、 もういっぺん行ってみたら、 何か見つかるかもしれないな！
Entry.EnglishText: Maybe we can find new things in other places we've been to too!

Entry.JapaneseText: 行った事がある場所でも、 もう一度調べたら、何か見つかる かもしれないって事ね……
Entry.EnglishText: We might be able to find things in other places we've been to if we stop by them again...

Entry.JapaneseText: 初めてのアイテム会話
Entry.EnglishText: First Time Item Conversation
